section.title: Introduction
section.p: Orbeon Forms 3.7.2 (Developer Release) features over 200 improvements since Orbeon Forms 3.7.1, including:

ul.li: new built-in XBL controls including a powerful datatable

section.p: This document describes changes made between Orbeon Forms 3.7.1 and Orbeon Forms 3.7.2.

p.b: Please also make sure to check all releases on the downloads page.

section.p: NOTE: As of November 9, 2009, Orbeon Forms 3.7.2 is not yet released. These notes are a work in progress.

section.title: Java 1.5 or greater is now required
section.p: Previous versions of Orbeon Forms worked with Java 1.4.x. With this version, Java 1.5 is now required, and Java 1.6 is recommended.

section.title: Removal of Xalan and XSLTC from the standard distribution
Deprecation and removal of Java classes
section.p: The following classes, usually referenced from web.xml and portlet.xml, are still available but deprecated:

ul.li: OPSServletContextListener and OPSServletContextListenerDelegate: use OrbeonServletContextListener and OrbeonServletContextListenerDelegate instead.
OPSSessionListener and OPSSessionListenerDelegate: use OrbeonSessionListener and OrbeonSessionListenerDelegate instead.

section.p: The following classes have been deprecated for a long time and are now removed:

ul.li: OXFServletContextListener and OXFServletContextListenerDelegate: use OrbeonServletContextListener and OrbeonServletContextListenerDelegate instead.
OXFSessionListener and OXFSessionListenerDelegate: use OrbeonSessionListener and OrbeonSessionListenerDelegate instead.
